name: Spellbreak
summary: Spellbreak is an epic fantasy action-spellcasting game where players fight to become an all-powerful battlemage. Weave spectacular spell combinations, craft strategic builds, and master your environment as you dominate the Hollow Lands solo or with friends in a non-stop quest for survival.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: Switch
  • 游戏类型: Battle royale
  • 游玩人数: 多人
  • 发行日期: 2020年9月3日
  • 售价: 免费
  • 官方网站: https://playspellbreak.com/
  • 开发: Proletariat
  • 发行: Proletariat
